testcase.name: Navigate user to 'Nationwide mortgage Page' as a New User
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the url https://www.nationwide.co.uk.......................passed When User navigates to Mortgage rates for 'New mortgage customer'...........passed Then 'Search for a Nationwide mortgage' Page should be displayed............passed

testcase.name: Find a mortgage rate for New User
testcase.system-out: Given when user is on the 'Search for a Nationwide mortgage' Page...........passed When the user selects No for Do you have a Nationwide mortgage option.......passed And I m changing lender' Option for 'What type of mortgage are you looking for?' menu.passed And the user enters 'Property value = £300,000'.............................passed And the user enters 'Mortgage amount = £150,000'............................passed And the user enters 'Term = 30 years'.......................................passed And Clicks on Find a Mortgage Rate button...................................passed And the user applies the first filter by 'Mortgage type = Fixed'............passed And the user selects the second filter by 'Deal period = 2 yr Fixed, 3 yr Fixed, 5 yr Fixed, 10 yr Fixed'.passed And And the user applies the third filter by 'Product fee = With Fee'.......passed Then System returns the products matching the filter criterion..............passed

testcase.name: Initiate Remortgage Application as a New User
testcase.system-out: Given the list of mortgages matching the filter criterion are available.....passed When the user clicks on 'More info and apply' for the '5 yr Fixed' product..passed And the user clicks on 'Apply' button.......................................passed Then the system displays 'Start your remortgage application' page...........passed
